attributes.action: Re-orientate public funds in favour of a younger demographic.
attributes.additional_details:
The average age of an MP is 50. http://www.parliament.uk/about/faqs/house-of-commons-faqs/members-faq-page2/

The average age in the UK is 40.
https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/geos/uk.html

The babyboomers have had their day. They enjoyed the boom years and now seem happy to deprive the next generation. This petition is not about a tax cut or rise. It is about a redirection of existing resources. Please sign this petition to show you discontent with the older generation their state of affairs.
